trophy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a large object such as a silver cup or plate that someone receives as a prize for winning a competition
trophy.translation[0].definitions[0].not: Football League/Masters/Heisman etc Trophy (=the name given to a particular competition for which the prize is a trophy)
trophy.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: walls lined with banners and athletic trophies
trophy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that you keep to prove your success in something, especially in war or hunting
trophy.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: A lionâ€™s head was among the trophies of his African trip.
